name: AddDeploySolutionPackage
description: Add/Deploy a SharePoint solution package in the Tenant App Catalog.
author: Yannick Reekmans

inputs.name: appCatalogConnection
inputs.label: Connection to the Tenant App Catalog
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service connection to the SharePoint Tenant App Catalog.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the App Service. You can Start, Stop, Restart, Slot swap, Install site extensions or enable Continuous Monitoring for an Azure App Service

inputs.name: appFilePath
inputs.label: Path to the SharePoint solution package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the SharePoint solution package that needs to be added to the SharePoint Tenant App Catalog.

inputs.name: overwriteExisting
inputs.label: Overwrite package if exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not an existing package with the same name will be overwritten.

inputs.name: packageIdIn
inputs.label: Id of the package in the SharePoint Tenant App Catalog
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the package in the SharePoint Tenant App Catalog.

inputs.name: skipFeatureDeployment
inputs.label: Tenant-wide deployment of the Solution Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tenant-wide deployment of the Solution Package.
